titles.title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to repeal exclusive representation, to remove any requirement that individual employees join or pay dues or fees to labor organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the National Labor Relations Act to repeal provisions for exclusive representation by a labor union and to remove requirements that individual employees join or pay dues or fees to labor unions.
